parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240014) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance transparency and are mandated for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "AUR - poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot la Senat și Camera Deputaților". This clearly refers to the AUR party and its position on the ballot for the Senate and Chamber of Deputies.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting Bistrița-Năsăud County. This indicates an attempt to reach a wide audience, not just personal communication. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's content aims to promote Dan Cosma, an AUR candidate, and encourages voters to vote for him and the AUR party.  The inclusion of links to the AUR program and Dan Cosma's personal website further reinforces this objective. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it mentions problems and solutions for Bistrița-Năsăud County, it primarily serves as self-promotion for the candidate and his party, not objective reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured campaign message designed to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1734603870433438</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Dan Cosma) and party (AUR) participating in the parliamentary elections, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the candidate and party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's end date (1732953600) corresponds to a date after the parliamentary election, making it a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Dan Cosma</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Dan Cosma], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 1734603870433438, care promovează candidatura sa la Senat și Camera Deputaților din partea AUR, menționând explicit poziția pe buletinul de vot și oferind link-uri către site-uri ale partidului, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea sa și a AUR, în clară încălcare a prevederilor legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale.  Postarea, care conține numărul CMF 11240014, îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind astfel o formă de propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
